document_data.name: Matteo's
document_data.mainbody: '''Matteo's''' was a renowned weaponsmith shop found in [[Phlan]] in [[1367 DR]]. The shop was owned by the [[half-elven]] smith [[Matteo]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located in the southwest section of the city.
document_data.Activities: Matteo's weapons were sought after by many soldiers and [[adventurer]]s in the Moonsea region. The quality of these weapons was reflected in their high prices. The shop also did repair work, but only for weapons of exceptional caliber.
